metadata.Title: CVE-2021-24122 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: When serving resources from a network location using the NTFS file system, Apache Tomcat versions 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.0-M9, 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.39, 8.5.0 to 8.5.59 and 7.0.0 to 7.0.106 were susceptible to JSP source code disclosure in some configurations. The root cause was the unexpected behaviour of the JRE API File.getCanonicalPath() which in turn was caused by the inconsistent behaviour of the Windows API (FindFirstFileW) in some circumstances.

notes.Note: leosilva> tomcat6 is out of support , marking tomcat6 for precise as ignored. mdeslaur> probably windows-specific, setting to negligible

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
